articles.title: As US cash dries up South Africa's fight to stop Aids gets harder - BBC
articles.description: Health experts fear that as testing and monitoring drops the risk of the further spread of HIV rises.
articles.content: "I often say to people, in order to end the epidemic for the world, we really do need to end the epidemic in South Africa. If we do not contain it, close it down, shut it down, we stand the huge risk… [+30 chars]
